4309610.name: Bouncekraft
4309610.description:
Prepare to Bounce

In Bouncekraft, you build structures that guide your bouncing clones to mine resources, farm food, conduct research, generate power, and construct modules for your ship.

As your underground base grows, you’ll unlock tools like Depots to launch resources across your mine, automate production, and prepare defenses against incoming asteroid waves.

Meanwhile, On the Surface

While your base operates underground, the surface is where your ship is tested.

Asteroid collectors trigger waves of incoming asteroids that you must actively destroy to earn resources. Shields and turrets will help you stay protected from increasingly intense waves of asteroids. Eventually you will be able to expand your ship with more slots for more modules and more powerful automatic tools for defense.

Master the Bounce

Eventually you will craft complex bounce paths that research, process material, charge shield and create ammo, and more. Scale up to dozens of clones launching in different directions and accomplishing different tasks.
Explore massive asteroids to mine resources and find Upgradium and Cores that can unlock permanent upgrades for you and your clones.

Uncover the mystery of the clones

Over time, learn more about the mystery of alien artifacts on the asteroids and the clones you are using to explore them. Finding the mysterious anomaly in each asteroid will reveal the secrets of the nature of this strange region of space.
